title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Student-Centered Science Projects for Engagement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in goal-setting and resource management during the 4-week science project planning phase.
Learners effectively utilize peer evaluations and feedback at least three times during a 3-month team-based project.
In the final presentation assessment, learners present creative problem-solving solutions connecting learning theories with practical cases over 90% of the time.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
